channel.title: Client runner error
channel.description:
Hi when i r un client i get a error [code]Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Can anyone please tell me what that error means and how to deal with it? because i wanted to go on my client and that come up. Also before you ask.. yes my server was on when i tried runnin th e client.
Please help me
Much appriciated.

item.title: Client runner error
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

i still get the same error dude… no matter what source or client

Read full topic
